pma:database.name: calendator
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `day` ( `linkid` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `day` date NOT NULL, `year` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `month` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `events` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`events`)), `coding` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`coding`)), `diary` mediumtext DEFAULT NULL, `layout` geometrycollection DEFAULT NULL, `schedule` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`schedule`)), `reminders` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`reminders`)), `timelog` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`timelog`)), `interruptors` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`interruptors`)), `x_1` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_1`)), `x_2` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_2`)), PRIMARY KEY (`linkid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
